title: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Nevske of Luhansk region, Yampolivka, Torske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation cond...
content: At Lyman direction Russian army shelled Nevske of Luhansk region, Yampolivka, Torske of Donetsk region. Russian aviation conducted airstrike at Cherneschyna of Kharkiv region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
